subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Don Miller, the longtime president of Roger Penske’s Nascar operation, has announced his retirement. Miller has been with Penske since it began racing stock cars in 1990. He has been at the top for 75 victories and more than $90 million in winnings.
